question: [File: third_party/move/move-model/src/builder/exp_builder.rs] [Function: fresh_type_var_idx()] [Integer overflow] Can an attacker trigger unbounded type inference that increments type_var_counter beyond u32::MAX, causing integer overflow and type variable collision that breaks type safety?
